PATIENT_ID: TEST_NEUROSURG_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-18 18:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-18 18:10:00
Category I activation for 30-year-old male. Pedestrian struck.
Traumatic brain injury suspected. Head injury from impact.
Patient intubated in field. Unable to assess GCS at this time.
BP 160/95, HR 58, RR 14 vent.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-18 18:30:00
CT scan pending. Head imaging not yet obtained.
No intracranial findings to report at this time.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-18 18:45:00
Suspected severe TBI but GCS not documented at arrival.
No CT completed. Imaging delayed due to hemodynamic management.
Unable to perform neurologic exam due to sedation.
Pending full assessment after stabilization.
